      • initializeSourceFiles

        public static java.util.ArrayList<SourceFile> initializeSourceFiles(java.lang.String sourceFileDirectory)
        The purpose of this function is just to prep file processing. We are not actually loading data yet
        Parameters:
        sourceFileDirectory -

      • validateSourceFileProviders

        public static void validateSourceFileProviders(java.util.ArrayList<Provider> providers,
                               java.util.ArrayList<SourceFile> sourceFiles)
        This method maps Providers to SourceFiles. Currently, if it doesn't map, we remove the sourcefile altogether.
        Parameters:
        providers -
        sourceFiles -

      • validateSourceFileSchemas

      • processSourceFiles

        public static void processSourceFiles(java.lang.String sourceFilesDirectory,
                      java.util.ArrayList<SourceFile> sourceFiles)
        This Function manages the processing of all of the source files. It loads that data into the SourceFile object and then performs any sort of cleansing validation, and/or processing on the data.
        Parameters:
        sourceFilesDirectory -
        sourceFiles -

      • outputStagedSourceFiles

        public static void outputStagedSourceFiles(java.lang.String stagedDirectory,
                           java.util.ArrayList<SourceFile> sourceFiles)
        Based upon the providers defined Output Type, we export the source files to the staged directory.
        Parameters:
        string -
        sourceFiles -
